ERGONOMIC HIGH-BACK OFFICE CHAIR: Provides exceptional seating for everyone from the CEO to the front office staff, ensuring the perfect balance of ergonomic comfort and optimal support for each employee

PRESSURE-RELIEVING COMFORT: Ventilated high mesh back with integrated lumbar support prevents overheating and promotes better posture, while the padded contoured waterfall seat helps relieve pressure from the legs

ARMRESTS AND CASTERS: Flip-up arms relieve tension from the neck and shoulders or can be placed upright to bring you closer to the desktop, and the 5-star base with dual caster wheels enables easy movement

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE SEATING: Features a pneumatic height adjustable seat that swivels 360 degrees and has a tilt lock with a 120-degree tilt tension to create a custom seating experience for all body types

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Measures 26.5" W x 26.5" D x 40.25-44" H and can be assembled in less than 30 minutes with the included tools and step-by-step instructions, and it wipes clean with a damp cloth for easy cleaning
body.description: Amplify any office or workspace with the comfort and simplistic style of the Flash Furniture Porter High-Back Swivel Office Chair. This ergonomic high-back swivel office chair provides exceptional seating for everyone from the CEO to the front office staff, ensuring the perfect balance of ergonomic comfort and optimal support for each employee. Packed with ergonomic features, the ventilated high mesh back with integrated lumbar support prevents overheating and promotes better posture, while the ultra-padded, contoured waterfall seat helps relieve pressure from the legs so you can take on even the longest work days without discomfort. The flip-up arms can be used in the downward position to relieve tension from the neck and shoulders or placed upright to bring you closer to the desktop, and the 5-star base designed with dual caster wheels enables you to move between areas with minimal effort. Additionally, the highly customizable office chair features a pneumatic height adjustable seat that swivels 360 degrees and has a tilt lock with a 120-degree tilt tension to create a comfortable, custom seating experience for all body types. Lean back while as you enjoy your lunch break or take a quick phone call, or lock in an upright position once it's time to focus. This high-back office chair measures 26.5" W x 26.5" D x 40.25-44" H and can be assembled in less than 30 minutes with the included tools and step-by-step instructions. As needed, the low-maintenance swivel mesh office can be wiped down with a damp cloth for quick and easy cleaning.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RESIDENTIAL In today’s ever-changing world, it is essential to create the perfect home environment that suits your lifestyle. Whether you are looking to setup a home office or refurnish your bedroom, Flash Furniture offers a variety of home furniture that is thoughtfully designed to bring you relaxation and satisfaction. RESTAURANT From bar stools to tables and everything in between, we provide an expansive assortment of products that allow you to customize your space. These items are specifically designed for the constant use and changing configurations of the restaurant environment. FOLDING CHAIRS Flash Furniture’s vast selection of folding chairs and tables are designed to provide quality and comfort combined with the convenience of folding and storing flat. These pieces offer easy, portable solutions for a wide variety of settings and space configurations. PATIO Our outdoor furniture options provide stylish comfort and durability for any type of exterior space. These pieces are made with materials to withstand the weather and designed for flexibility in any outdoor setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a white computer chair to replace the one I had for a few years. There were a lot of choices but somehow this one caught my eye! so very glad It did, it was not the most expensive but for the price this chair looks expensive and is beautiful! Quite easy to put together which is a plus, and once put together it looks beautiful and very comfortable. This one was really a great choice for me, just got it together and so far no issues. Just love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has to be put together so some may need help
reviews.reviewText: Looks nice and is deep seated so not for short person. Fairly comfortable. I use a pillow to support my back. Not easy to roll on carpet when in it but love that the arms lift up!Great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well with a few add-on's...
reviews.reviewText: Overall this chair is comfortable and offers decent support. The seat pad is not super squishy but is supportive and I like that it's contoured, it's not just a flat surface. Lower back support is good. Easy to put together. The two reasons I decided to try this chair is because it came in various colors (I got the blue) and had arm rests that you can lift up and out of the way if you want to move in close to the desk. I have not had any issues sliding off the seat like others have mentioned. It has a nice range of height adjustment. It does recline and also has a recline lock and tension adjustment. Not sure why others have said it doesn't recline?? Maybe the put the base on backwards??However it's not perfect but with a couple of add-on's it's very close. I added rollerblade style wheels which I ordered on Amazon to prevent any floor scratching issues on my wood laminate flooring. Also the fabric is a little itchy for lack of a better term. But the only place it bothered me was on my elbows. I often rest the point of my elbows on the arm rest and the fabric is very irritating over time. So I ordered arm chair pads on Amazon which should solve that issue. Even with the add on's it's still a good price. I guess very few chairs will be perfect but for the price this is a good chair. If it can hold up and last for at least a few years then it will have been worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I would give this 5 stars but for the fact that the first time I used it the back would not recline when pulling the height handle out. It did work first time I sat in it, but when I actually started using it the handle no longer release the back. No help from the online customer service, in fact, there doesn’t seem to be online customer service even though (unless I’ve misunderstood) it is advertised and there is a link. So, not a 5 star review. EDIT: The manufacturer messaged me and asked me to respond via Amazon messages, but I couldn’t figure out how to. In the meantime, my husband showed me that the chair does indeed rock back, I’m just too small and lightweight to make it happen! So I’ve gone back and updated to a 5 star review because it’s a great price and a very nice chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am writing this review because I read some else’s review that changed my mind and find it quite amusing‼️I read many reviews before purchasing and only found a few that didn’t like the chair. I ordered and proceeded to put it together. I sat in it and was not happy‼️I felt like I was sliding out of it. Not comfortable and did not recline. THEN my mind recalled someone else said that and someone else replied saying “maybe you put the seat on BACKWARDS! I immediately got out pictures of it AND the instructions and, sure enough, I had it on backwards‼️😂 it was easy to put together (even twice) and I’m 89 years old and did it ALONE‼️If I can do it, anyone can and NOW, I LOVE IT‼️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect office chair
reviews.reviewText: I like that the arm rests flip up so the chair can be neatly tucked under the desk to save office space. I'm a little nervous about having ordered the white on white chair, but I'll deal with it. The chair is comfortable for long stretches at a desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I wish to know before I bought it
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this chair for 3 months now. there are a few things I want to mention about this chair.1. Easy to assemble. It only took 20 min. The picture and instructions were pretty easy to understand.2. It looks cute after assembling. (I got a white one, it is so cute)3. The arm rester is comfortable4. The seat cushion is not as comfortable and soft as I expected. After I seat around 30min, my butt hurts so bad. So I walk or stand up a little bit.5. After u assemble it, have a cute chair for maybe one or two days. After that, use the cover!! Because mine got a stain within a week. I tried to remove it, but no luck. I wish I used a cushion cover earlier.6. THIS IS IMPORTANT. The seat tilt doesn't work. I have to push with force to tilt it just a little bit (I know it has a tilt lock and it was unlocked). I'm 60kg so I don't think it is because I'm light either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Weight Limit is 250 is quite a bit more.
reviews.reviewText: So I’m 6’0 320lbs I’m a big guy with a big butt. I needed a chair that would atleast hold my weight but also be comfortable, so as a normal low class citizen I decided to get this budget chair. I ordered it on August 22nd, 2021 I had this chair almost 2 years and it’s held out pretty well. I don’t sit in it 24/7 even tho I’m a avid gamer but I sit it in around 3-4 hours a day and with pretty much 600+ days of gaming in it this chair has held up well. Assembly was pretty easy took me 15 minutes but that’s subjective to how fast you could think or how well you use your hands. Overall the chair is sold the armrests are a bit itchy but that’s also subjective to your skin sensitivity, but the main knocker from 5 stars is that the armrests are pretty easy to loosen and can be a hassle some times. One of my armrests are completely loose and I just stopped tightening it because I stopped caring, but nonetheless is a good chair and it’s surprisingly strong.

reviews.reviewTitle: The chair I've been looking for
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a cute and comfortable chair to match my white set up and this one is fantastic for me! I can sit on it for a long time (working and gaming) and I find it very comfortable and I don't have back pain.
Comfortable chair. A little struggle to assemble, but not too tough.

Everything has been great with this chair. Swivels perfect and extremely comfortable. The only that sucked was it didn't come with instructions, so I had to guess which screws went where but eventually got it all together.
